name: Resident Evil Code: Veronica
description:
After narrowly surviving the horrific onslaught in Raccoon City, Claire Redfield now seeks clues in search of her missing brother, Chris. The Umbrella Corporation memo read: 

"Confidential: Phase I -- Raccoon City. Test complete. Phase II -- Paris Facility. Fully Operational."

To her horror, she discovers Umbrella Corporation's insidious activities are not isolated to the remote, mid-western city. No. Something much larger is going on here. Flesh-eating zombies, horrific beasts and even stranger mutations have spread to a global scale!
